attributes.action: award Pc Bill Barker the highest possible honour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the prime minister or the queen whoever has the power to award Pc Bill Barker postumostuly the highest honour for his outstanding bravery in sacrificing his life to save members of the public, he is a shining example of what our emergency services do for us the general public without a thought for their own safety and this act of bravery should be duly recognised

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
